title: Filthy Farm Jobs | Philip Learns to Milk Cows | S1E2

tasks.task: Responding to Philip at the beginning of the video.
subtasks: Engaging in conversation with Philip upon arrival.
Getting prepared for the meeting with state legislators.
Changing clothes before getting to work.
Using Stanley to cover meetings while performing milking tasks.
Activating the machine to milk cows.
Catching and disposing of alleyway waste.
Observing the automaticity of the milking machine.
Acknowledging the importance of cleaning and cooling the milk.

tasks.task: Examining the living conditions of the cows.
subtasks: Noting the access to water and feed for the cows.
Gaining appreciation for the dairy farmer's role.
Expressing support for dairy farmers in Arkansas.
